channel.title: Where can i get learning
channel.description:
I am sick and tired of always waiting for my favortie server to come online so I decided I wanted to start learning how to edit and make my server better for myself by learning Java programming.
My question is where to start.Anyone know a site or anything thats a good started? How did you people start learning.
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 07, 2006, 11:53:33 PM[/size][hr]i have started with a source that someone already had going and had lots of npcs and everythign started.
My first big prroblem is how to craft more then 50 runes at a time.

item.title: Where can i get learning
item.dc:creator: @cappy cappy
item.description:
@cappy wrote:

to craft more than 50 runes at a time, you need to edit each one. open client.java and search for
// Nature rift

scroll down a little and you will see something like
addItem(561, 100);

changed the 50, or whatever it is to how many runes you want to get each time.

Read full topic
